Hi,

I can't run a crawl job, it fails at ht.put(JmxUtils.JMX_PORT, 
hht.get(JmxUtils.JMX_PORT)); line of code in 
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJob when i start my job. 
hht.get(JmxUtils.JMX_PORT) return null and null pointer exception arises.

Where can i should specify jmx port?

i'm even not sure if there jmx agent running. Maybe it's possible to 
tell heritrix to run without jmx support?

My configuration:

Heritrix 1.10.0
Tomcat 5.5.17
Java 1.5.0_03
Windows XP Pro
